lead_paragraph: An injured riot police officer was dragged from an ambulance by a crowd of ethnic Madhesis in Mahottari District protesting a plan to carve out seven federal provinces.

headline.main: Police Officer Beaten to Death in Nepal Amid Protests Over Draft Constitution

snippet: An injured riot police officer was dragged from an ambulance by a crowd of ethnic Madhesis in Mahottari District protesting a plan to carve out seven federal provinces.
